Presenting to HR IMEA team on a career progression toolkit “HR Think Tomorrow”
Researching and presenting to HR IMEA Leadership team on integrating Gen-Z into workforce
Organizing “AskHR” sessions monthly for supporting stakeholders/business
Currently accelerating gender diversity/People of Determination in 9 Henkel L&HC production plants

Annual People Review/Role Ambition Calibration:
Arranging over 9 Re PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Regional HR Junior Specialist                                                                                                                                  Currently: Specialist Human Resources Business Partner Laundry & Home Care MEA
Special projects:
Presenting to HR IMEA team on a career progression toolkit “HR Think Tomorrow”
Researching and presenting to HR IMEA Leadership team on integrating Gen-Z into workforce
Organizing “AskHR” sessions monthly for supporting stakeholders/business
Currently accelerating gender diversity/People of Determination in 9 Henkel L&HC production plants
Talent Acquisition: Prescreening candidates and attending interviews with hiring managers
Talent & Development:
Annual People Review/Role Ambition Calibration:
Arranging over 9 Regional APR conferences for L&HC business units
Calibration of ~300 employees’ ratings, guiding managers on people review/role ambition philosophy
Ensuring timely system completion from 12 countries in L&HC MEA business
Collection and validation of ~ 200-300 training nominations for L&HC MEA based on the training’s eligibility criteria and training budget available for each of the 12 countries
Business Partnering:
Preparation of various HR reports via SAP/Power BI software for 3 regions: LATAM MEA APAC (20 countries)
Hiring request collection from the 3 regions with taking initiative to digitalize the hiring approval process
Fully supporting in cascading HR strategy to business
Being the first point of contact to support business in HR processes
Ensuring organizational effectiveness by maintaining accurate organizational charts on the system
Collaborating with 20 countries for implementing workforce planning on an annual basis
Total Rewards:
Guiding managers on merit increase/short-term incentive philosophy
Ensuring timely system completion from business for the 12 countries in LHC MEA
Preparation of promotion packages for UAE based employees.
Regional HR Intern
Provided full support to the Regional Head of HR by coordinating different HR projects/presentations in IMEA region.
Tracking HR KPI’s for IMEA countries: voluntary attrition rates, time to offer, cost per hire & drop-off rates.
AZADEA GROUP, DUBAI, UAE	Aug 2017 – Nov 2017
Assistant Recruitment Specialist
Liaising with recruitment specialist and line manager to ensure a complete understanding of candidate requirements and preferences.
Involved with building effective working relationships with colleges and universities for recruitment purposes.
Shortlisting Walk in CVs and from Human Resource Management System.
Prescreening candidates and inviting successful candidates to HR interviews.
Conducting weekly group assessments.
Involved in shortlisting and selection processes for candidates in the fashion and food and beverage divisions.
AZADEA GROUP, DUBAI, UAE                                                                    May 2016 – Aug 2016 & May 2017 – July 2017
Recruitment Intern
Prescreening candidates’ CVs.
Attending HR interviews for the fashion and food and beverage divisions.
Doing reference checks on candidates.
Prescreening candidates and inviting successful candidates to HR interviews.
Scheduling interviews.
Involved in organizing weekly group assessments.
LANGUAGE SKILLS
English (Native)
Farsi (Oral Expression & Comprehension)
Hindi, French & Arabic (Beginner)
EDUCATION
Heriot-Watt University, Dubai, UAE
Psychology and Management BSc (with Honors): 2013-2017
Second Upper-Class Distinction
Member of the Psychology Society in Heriot-Watt University Dubai Campus from 2015-2017
Class representative of fourth year students studying Psychology & Management

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
